description: Defines a custom Flutter widget called PrimaryButton, which extends StatelessWidget. The widget creates a styled elevated button with customizable label, icon, color override, and onPressed callback.

classes.name: PrimaryButton
classes.description: A customizable button widget with optional icon and color override, using Flutter's ElevatedButton.

methods.name: PrimaryButton
methods.description: Constructor for the PrimaryButton widget, requiring label and onPressed, with optional icon and colorOverride.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the PrimaryButton, creating an ElevatedButton with styling and optional icon.
